name: Edward SIMMONS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Department of Labor and Industry, Intervenor

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: Edward SIMMONS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Department of Labor and Industry, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Sharon M. Dietrich, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Clifford F. Blaze, Deputy Chief Counsel, John E. Herzog, Asst. Counsel, for appellee.
Frayda Kamber and Sean F. Creegan, Harrisburg, for intervenor Dept. of Labor and Industry.
casebody.head_matter:
599 A.2d 646
Edward SIMMONS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Department of Labor and Industry, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1991.
Decided Nov. 22, 1991.
Sharon M. Dietrich, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Clifford F. Blaze, Deputy Chief Counsel, John E. Herzog, Asst. Counsel, for appellee.
Frayda Kamber and Sean F. Creegan, Harrisburg, for intervenor Dept. of Labor and Industry.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
